<article class="markdown-body entry-content" itemprop="mainContentOfPage"><hr><p>layout: post

title: Draw A Map of China onto A Color Image categories:

  • R language tags:
  • image()

- Map

What we need to do is just use the parameter add = TRUE in the function of map() (package maps):

Source code:

Liquid error: No such file or directory - pygmentize

Packages maps and mapdata are required for the map of China.
